original_text: For before certain men came from James, he used to eat with the Gentiles. But when they arrived, he began to draw back and separate himself from the Gentiles because he was afraid of those who belonged to the circumcision group.
korean_text: 야고보에게서 온 어떤 이들이 이르기 전에 게바가 이방인과 함께 먹다가 그들이 오매 그가 할례자들을 두려워하여 떠나 물러가매

sentences.original_text: For before certain men came from James
sentences.korean_translation: 야고보에게서 온 어떤 사람들이 오기 전에는

sentences.original_text: he used to eat with Gentiles
of those who belonged to the circumcision group
